title: Low Priority Queue
body: I stopped playing maybe a year or two ago. I recently picked the game back up and every time I log on and try to play I'm in Low Priority queue. How much longer is it going to be in effect? I'm sure I've played more than 5 games at this point and it's severely impacting my urge to continue.

replies.body: [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will remain on an account until the required games are completed without leaving.  I looked into this for you, and it looks like you have 2 games left.  Your leaverbuster was escalated so it required a bit more than 5.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Thanks! I was wondering what was. I'll knock out these last few matches and get back to it. Have a great night!
